it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.view

Class TableView

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.view.TableView

  • public class TableView
extends java.lang.Object
    Equivalent of the Model Table but simplified for the View.
    Author:
    Luca Napoletano, Claudio Montanari
